Package org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.pictures

Class Picture

java.lang.Object
org.academiadecodigo.simplegraphics.pictures.Picture
All Implemented Interfaces:
Movable, Shape
public class Picture extends Object implements Shape, Movable
A picture from an image file.
